name: slider

textcolor.description:
Slider label text color. Valid entries are: black, magenta,
	cyan, orange, darkgray, pink, gray, white, lightgray, yellow.

message.description: Message text to appear if validation fails.

range.description:
The values of the left and right slider range. The slider value displays as the slider is moved.
    Separate values by a comma.

notsupported.description:
The text to display if a page containing a Java applet-based cfform control is opened by a
		browser that does not support Java or has Java support disabled.

bold.description: Enter Yes for bold label text, No for medium text. Default is No.

lookandfeel.description: A stylistic choice for the slider.

onvalidate.description:
The name of a valid JavaScript function used to validate user input; in this case,
		a change to the default slider value.

width.description: Width of the slider control, in pixels.

name.description: A name for the cfslider control.

tickmarkmajor.description: Yes to render major tickmarks in the slider scale.

value.description:
The starting slider setting. Must be within the values specified in range. Defaults to the
		minimum value specified in range.

label.description: A label that displays with the slider control.

height.description: Height of the slider control, in pixels.

tickmarkminor.description: Yes to render minor tickmarks in the slider scale.

onerror.description: The name of a valid JavaScript function to execute in the event of a failed validation.

bgcolor.description: Background color of slider label. See textColor for color options.

vertical.description:
Yes renders the slider in the browser vertically. No renders the slider horizontally.
	This is the default.

scale.description: Unsigned integer. Defines the slider scale within the value of range.

italic.description: Yes for italicized label text, No for normal text. Default is No.

hspace.description: Horizontal margin spacing to the left and right of slider control, in pixels.

vspace.description: Vertical margin spacing above and below slider control, in pixels.

fontsize.description: Font size for label text measured in points.

refreshlabel.description: Yes or No. If Yes, the label is not refreshed when the slider is moved. Default is Yes.

description:
Used inside cfform, cfslider lets you place a slider control in a CFML form. A slider
  control is like a sliding volume control. The slider groove is the area over which the slider moves.
